name: Gadgeteer
body:
### Gadgeteer Examples
[Gadgeteer](http://www.ghielectronics.com/technologies/.net-gadgeteer) is open-source hardware implementation using the [.NET Micro Framework](http://www.netmf.com/) from GHI Electronics. GHI provides some excellent code snippets for many of their Gadgeteer modules. However, they don't provide any full working solutions.  This project documents many of their modules with full working Visual Studio solution files.

### 2013/04/14 WiFi RS21 Example
#### Using the Wifi RS21 Module to host a server


### Request for examples
Please contact me at [wbsimms.com](http://wbsimms.com) if you want a specific example published.
